AU.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
AU.description: Come roam the halls of Monster High and get to know your new classmates. Join clubs, make friends and dress up in fierce fashions. But be aware, there’s something strange going on at Monster High! Cleo’s new amulet has been cursed by the spirit of Spookenhamen, and the student body is falling under his spell. Use your skills and savvy to help save the school and all your new classmates from the mummy’s curse! Be Yourself. Be Unique. Be a Monster.

BG.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
BG.description: Come roam the halls of Monster High and get to know your new classmates. Join clubs, make friends and dress up in fierce fashions. But be aware, there’s something strange going on at Monster High! Cleo’s new amulet has been cursed by the spirit of Spookenhamen, and the student body is falling under his spell. Use your skills and savvy to help save the school and all your new classmates from the mummy’s curse! Be Yourself. Be Unique. Be a Monster.

CH.name: Monster High: Aller Anfang ist schwer
CH.description: Durchstreife die Hallen der Monster High und lerne deine neuen Klassenkameraden kennen. Trete Clubs bei, schließe neue Freundschaften und zieh dir abgefahrene Klamotten an. Aber gib Acht, denn in der Monster High geht es nicht mit rechten Dingen zu! Der Geist von Spookenhamen hat Cleos neues Amulett verflucht und zieht alle Studierenden in seinen Bann. Setze deine Fertigkeiten mit Köpfchen ein, um die Schule und deine neuen Klassenkameraden vor dem Fluch der Mumie zu retten! Sei Du selbst. Sei einzigartig. Sei ein Monster.

ES.name: Monster High: La chica nueva del insti
ES.description: Ven a deambular por los pasillos de Monster High y conoce a tus nuevos compañeros de clase. Únete a los clubs, haz amigos y vístete con modas monstruosas. ¡Pero, ten cuidado, algo extraño está pasando en Monster High! El nuevo amuleto de Cleo ha sido maldecido por el espíritu de Spookenhamen, y el alumnado está cayendo bajo su hechizo. ¡Usa tus habilidades y tu destreza para ayudar a salvar la escuela y a todos tus nuevos compañeros del maleficio de la momia! Sé tú misma. Sé única. Sé monstruosa.

FR.name: Une nouvelle élève à Monster High
FR.description: Vien errer dans les salles de Monster High et fait connaissance avec vos nouveaux camarades de classe. Adhérez à des clubs, faites des amis et déguisez-vous en mode féroces. Mais faites attention, il se passe quelque chose d'étrange à Monster High ! La nouvelle amulette de Cleo a été maudite par l'esprit de Spookenhamen, et le corp de l'étudiant tombe sous son charme. Utilisez vos compétences et inteligence pour aider à sauver l'école et tous vos nouveaux camarades de classe de la malédiction de la momie!

PT.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
PT.description: Vem vaguear pelos corredores de Monster High e conhece os teus novos colegas de turma. Junta-te a clubes, faz amigos e veste-te de forma arrojada. Mas tem cuidado, está a passar-se algo estranho em Monster High! O novo amuleto da Cleo foi amaldiçoado pelo espírito de Spookenhamen e o corpo estudantil está sob o seu feitiço. Usa as tuas habilidades e conhecimentos para ajudar a salvar a escola e todos os teus novos colegas de turma da maldição da múmia! Sê tu própria. Sê única. Sê uma monstrinha.

NL.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
NL.description: Kom zwerven door de hallen van Monster High en leer je nieuwe klasgenoten kennen. Word lid van clubs, maak vrienden en kleed je in woeste mode. Maar wees ervan bewust, dat er iets vreemds aan de hand is op Monster High! Cleo's nieuwe amulet is vervloekt door de geest van Spookenhamen, en de nieuwe studentenraad is onderhevig aan zijn spreuk. Gebruik je vaardigheden en slimheid om de school en al je nieuwe klasgenoten te helpen redden van de vloek van de mummie! Wees jezelf. Wees uniek. Wees een Monster.

IT.name: Monster High: Una Nuova Mostramica a Scuola
IT.description: Venite a girovagare per le sale della scuola Monster High e incontra i nuovi compagni di classe. Partecipa ai club, fai nuove amicizie e segui le mode feroci. Ma attenzione, c'è qualcosa di strano che sta accadendo alla Monster High! Il nuovo amuleto di Cleo è stato maledetto dallo spirito di Spookenhamen, e tutto il corpo studentesco è caduto sotto il suo sortilegio. Usa le tue abilità e sagacia per contribuire a salvare la scuola e tutti i tuoi nuovi compagni di classe dalla maledizione della mummia! Sii te stesso. Sii Unico. Sii un Mostro.

ZA.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
ZA.description: Come roam the halls of Monster High and get to know your new classmates. Join clubs, make friends and dress up in fierce fashions. But be aware, there’s something strange going on at Monster High! Cleo’s new amulet has been cursed by the spirit of Spookenhamen, and the student body is falling under his spell. Use your skills and savvy to help save the school and all your new classmates from the mummy’s curse! Be Yourself. Be Unique. Be a Monster.

SE.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
SE.description: Come roam the halls of Monster High and get to know your new classmates. Join clubs, make friends and dress up in fierce fashions. But be aware, there’s something strange going on at Monster High! Cleo’s new amulet has been cursed by the spirit of Spookenhamen, and the student body is falling under his spell. Use your skills and savvy to help save the school and all your new classmates from the mummy’s curse! Be Yourself. Be Unique. Be a Monster.

RU.name: Monster High New Ghoul in School™
RU.description: Пойдем бродить по залам Школе Монстров и узнавать новых одноклассников. Присоединяйтесь к клубам, заведите новых друзей и оденьтесь в ожесточенные моды. Но имейте в виду, что-то странное происходит в Школе Монстров! Новый амулет Cleo был проклят духом Spookenhamen, и тело студента под влиянием его чар. Используйте все свои навыки и смекалку, чтобы помочь спасти школу, и всех ваших новых одноклассников из проклятия мумии! Будь Собой. Будь Уникальным. Будь Монстром.
